text: 1.42 Mat 16.18, Mak 3.16 Edlu anɨb agɨl, nɨmam Saymon nop poŋɨd Jisas yek ak amnak. Amek, Jisas Saymon nop nɨŋɨd anɨb agak, Nad Saymon, Jon ñɨne agak. Yɨb nep Sipas agɨnɨgabal agak. Yɨb Sipas agak anɨb ak, Pita yɨb ak alog mɨdeb. Yɨb anɨb omɨŋal jɨj ak, kab.1.42 Yɨb Sipas ak, Alam takaw agɨl apal. Ñɨn anɨb ak, Alam takaw ak Juda takaw kɨli ak. Pen yɨb Pita ak, Glik takaw agɨl apal.
